thread.title: Ron Borum

author: Ron Borum
title: Ron Borum
text: I had no idea of size, colors, application method or anything, but was looking for lettering for my newly acquired Jet Boat..I found DIY Letterings website and they provided an on line look at previous users applications.. In about an hour, I was ready to design what I wanted using their step by step pick and choose screens..I was equally surprised at how quickly and well protected my products came thru the packaging system..everything was true to color, size, and quality as represented..This is a great company and I plan to use them again shortly, and fully recommend them to all who need lettering..
